name: mean-liquid
description: Helps developers track, version, and deploy database changes.

scripts.alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && npm run publish-internal --tag=alpha
scripts.beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm run publish-internal --tag=beta
scripts.major: npm version major && npm run publish-internal
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm run publish-internal
scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm run publish-internal
scripts.prerelease: npm version prerelease && npm run publish-internal --tag=prerelease

author: Dustin Zeigler
